name: memoize-one
description: A memoization library which only remembers the latest invocation
author: Alex Reardon <alexreardon@gmail.com>

scripts.test: yarn run lint && yarn run typecheck && yarn run test:fast
scripts.test:fast: cross-env NODE_ENV=test mocha test --compilers js:babel-core/register --globals global
scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:lib && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:flow
scripts.build:flow: flow-copy-source --verbose src lib && flow-copy-source --verbose src es
scripts.coverage: yarn run coverage:analyise && yarn run coverage:report && yarn run coverage:publish
